mapper.insert: insert into approval_log (approvalId, action, approvalTime) values #{approvalId}, #{action}, now()
mapper.select: SELECT al.approvalId, al.draftId, al.action, al.approvalTime, a.`order` FROM approval_log al JOIN approvals a ON al.approvalId = a.userId AND al.draftId = a.draftId WHERE al.draftId = #{draftId};
